Pre-Game Insights: Dallas Mavericks and Orlando Magic face off in a non-conference game on November 4, 2024.
Dallas Mavericks finished last season with a 50-32 record and averaged 25.7 assists per game.
Orlando Magic finished last season with a 47-35 record and averaged 24.7 assists per game.

Injuries for the game include Dante Exum (out with wrist injury) and Maxi Kleber (day to day with hamstring injury) for the Mavericks, and Paolo Banchero (out with abdomen injury) and Goga Bitadze (day to day with foot injury) for the Magic.
